session.objective: Integrate engineering knowledge from commits 8b8fae4e and cb65b561 into agents, skills, and commands following analyst recommendations

completeSessionLog.evidence: Session log updated with artifacts, decisions, and outcomes

routeToQA.evidence: N/A - enhancements to existing agents, not new features requiring QA

commitChanges.evidence: Two commits created: P0 (commit 5639b23f) and P1 (pending)

workLog.action: Analyst agent created engineering knowledge enrichment analysis

deliverables.description: Added strategic analysis frameworks: Cynefin, Wardley Mapping, Rumsfeld Matrix
Added principal-level decision frameworks and legacy modernization patterns
Added inversion thinking protocol for failure mode identification
Created unified engineering knowledge index across 67 memories and 5 experience tiers
Added strategic knowledge section with OODA Loop, Inversion Thinking, Three Horizons
Added strategic knowledge section with Three Horizons, Critical Path, Cynefin
Added strategic knowledge section with foundational principles
Added OODA Loop decision cycle and Inversion Thinking methodology
Added Three Horizons Framework and Critical Path Method
Added Lindy Effect technology maturity assessment framework
Enhanced buy vs build framework with Core vs Context, hidden costs analysis
Added strategic review checklist with principal-level validation

decisions.decision: Implement P0 items in single commit, P1 items in second commit
decisions.rationale: Clear separation of critical vs high-priority enhancements for review

decisions.decision: Add Strategic Knowledge Available sections to 5 key agents only
decisions.rationale: Analyst, architect, high-level-advisor, planner, implementer are highest-impact
decisions.impact: Focused on agents that make strategic decisions

decisions.decision: Embed framework guidance directly in agent prompts
decisions.rationale: Reduces context switching, makes knowledge immediately accessible
decisions.impact: Agents can access frameworks proactively during reasoning

nextSteps: Monitor for potential P2 enhancements (orchestrator routing, push-pr checks)
Update Serena memory with cross-session learnings
Consider expanding to remaining agents based on adoption metrics
